Mods.LoadCommand:
%xero(function(self) local SineS, CubicS, QuintS, CircS, ElasticS, QuadS, QuartS, ExpoS, BackS, BounceS = inOutSine, inOutCubic, inOutQuint, inOutCirc, inOutElastic, inOutQuad, inOutQuart, inOutExpo, inOutBack, inOutBounce
definemod {'shakez', function(p) for pn = 1,2 do P[pn]:vibrate() P[pn]:effectperiod(0.25) P[pn]:effectclock('beat') P[pn]:effectmagnitude(0,0,p) end end}
-- your code goes here here: set {0, 0.1, 'xmod', 1, 'zbuffer', 1, 'approachtype', 200, 'modtimer', 1, 'halgun', 1, 'dizzyholds', -100, 'drawsizeback', 1, 'stealthtype', 1, 'stealthpastreceptors', 1, 'receptorzbuffer',30,'reverse',200,'mini',100,'cover'} set {0, 500, 'zoomz'}
ease2 (4,1,CubicS,0,'mini')
ease {4, 32-4, inExpo, 2, 'xmod',0,'reverse'}
ease {4, 32-4, flip(linear), 360*4, 'rotationy2'} ease {4, 32-4, flip(inSine), 360*1, 'rotationx2'}
func{0,function() for pn = 1,2 do P[pn]:x(SCREEN_CENTER_X) end end}
local f = 1 for i=4,31 do ease {i, 1, flip(outSine), 100, 'z'} ease {i, 1, flip(outSine), -5*f, 'rotationz'} ease {i, 1, flip(outSine), 125, 'zoomx'} ease {i, 1, flip(outSine), 50, 'stealth'} mod_kick(i,1,0, 0.1,'bgkick','Quart','Quart') f = f * -1 end
ease {60, 1, flip(outQuart), -200, 'tiny'} ease {61.5, 1, flip(outQuart), -200, 'tiny'} ease {62, 1, flip(outQuart), -200, 'tiny'} ease {63, 1, flip(outQuart), -200, 'tiny'} ease {64.5, 1, flip(outQuart), -200, 'tiny'} ease {65, 1, flip(outQuart), -200, 'tiny'}
ease {60, 1, flip(outQuart), 0.1, 'bgkick'} ease {61.5, 1, flip(outQuart), 0.1, 'bgkick'} ease {62, 1, flip(outQuart), 0.1, 'bgkick'} ease {63, 1, flip(outQuart), 0.1, 'bgkick'} ease {64.5, 1, flip(outQuart), 0.1, 'bgkick'} ease {65, 1, flip(outQuart), 0.1, 'bgkick'}
ease {60, 1, flip(outQuart), -200, 'tipsy'} ease {61.5, 1, flip(outQuart), 200, 'tipsy'} ease {62, 1, flip(outQuart), -200, 'tipsy'} ease {63, 1, flip(outQuart), 200, 'tipsy'} ease {64.5, 1, flip(outQuart), -200, 'tipsy'} ease {65, 1, flip(outQuart), 200, 'tipsy'}
ease {64, 4, inSine, 1, 'bgzoom'} -- I did some BG stuff here, oops ~Sudo --[[ ease2 (68,1,CircS,-0.5,'bgzoom') ease2 (70,1,CircS, 0,'bgzoom') ]]
ease2 (60,1,CircS,100,'reverse') ease2 (61,1,CircS,0,'reverse')
ease2 (63,1,CircS,-50,'x') ease2 (64,1,CircS,50,'x') ease2 (66,1,CircS,0,'x')
ease2 (63,1,CircS,-50,'confusionzoffset') ease2 (64,1,CircS,50,'confusionzoffset') ease2 (66,1,CircS,0,'confusionzoffset')
ease2 (66,2,flip(CubicS),360,'rotationx2')
local f = 1 for i=64.5,67.5,0.5 do mod_kick(i,0.5,0, 50,'y','Cubic','Cubic') f = f * -1 end
ease {38, 1, flip(outSine), 50, 'stealth'} ease {40, 1, flip(outSine), 50, 'stealth'} ease {42, 1, flip(outSine), 50, 'stealth'}
ease {46, 1, flip(outSine), 50, 'stealth'} ease {48, 1, flip(outSine), 50, 'stealth'} ease {50, 1, flip(outSine), 50, 'stealth'}
ease {52, 1, flip(outSine), 50, 'stealth'} ease {54, 1, flip(outSine), 50, 'stealth'} ease {56, 1, flip(outSine), 50, 'stealth'}
-------------------- funk shit ---------------------------- ease2 (98,1,CircS,0.5,'bgzoom') ease2 (100,1,CircS,-0.5,'bgzoom')
local f = 1 for i=102,102+4,2 do ease2 (i,0.75,ExpoS,300,'z') ease2 (i+1,1,ExpoS,0,'z')
ease2 (i,0.5,CubicS,100,'flip') ease2 (i+0.5,0.25,CubicS,0,'flip') ease2 (i+0.75,0.25,CubicS,100,'flip') ease2 (i+1,0.5,CubicS,0,'flip')
ease2 (i+1.5,0.5,CubicS,100,'invert') ease2 (i+2,0.5,CubicS,0,'invert')
ease2 (i,1,BackS,-250,'tinyz') ease2 (i+1,1,BackS,0,'tinyz')
ease2 (i+2,0.5,CubicS,0,'x') ease2 (i+1,0.5,CubicS,100*f,'x') ease2 (i+1.5,0.5,CubicS,-100*f,'x')
ease2 (i+1,1,QuartS,20*f,'rotationz') ease2 (i+2,1,QuartS,0,'rotationz')
mod_kick(i,1,100, 300,'zoomx','Expo','Back')
ease2 (i,1,ExpoS,0.5,'bgzoom') ease2 (i+1,1,ExpoS,0,'bgzoom')
ease2 (i,1,ExpoS,-20*f,'bgrotz') ease2 (i+1,1,ExpoS,0,'bgrotz')
f = f * -1 end
local f = 1 for i=110,110+2,2 do ease2 (i,0.75,ExpoS,300,'z') ease2 (i+1,1,ExpoS,0,'z')
ease2 (i,0.5,CubicS,100,'flip') ease2 (i+0.5,0.25,CubicS,0,'flip') ease2 (i+0.75,0.25,CubicS,100,'flip') ease2 (i+1,0.5,CubicS,0,'flip')
ease2 (i+1.5,0.5,CubicS,100,'invert') ease2 (i+2,0.5,CubicS,0,'invert')
ease2 (i,1,BackS,-250,'tinyz') ease2 (i+1,1,BackS,0,'tinyz')
ease2 (i+2,0.5,CubicS,0,'x') ease2 (i+1,0.5,CubicS,100*f,'x') ease2 (i+1.5,0.5,CubicS,-100*f,'x')
ease2 (i+1,1,QuartS,-20*f,'rotationz') ease2 (i+2,1,QuartS,0,'rotationz')
mod_kick(i,1,100, 300,'zoomx','Expo','Back')
ease2 (i,1,ExpoS,0.5,'bgzoom') ease2 (i+1,1,ExpoS,0,'bgzoom')
ease2 (i,1,ExpoS,20*f,'bgrotz') ease2 (i+1,1,ExpoS,0,'bgrotz')
f = f * -1 end
local f = 1 for i=118,118+4,2 do ease2 (i,0.75,ExpoS,300,'z') ease2 (i+1,1,ExpoS,0,'z')
ease2 (i,0.5,CubicS,100,'flip') ease2 (i+0.5,0.25,CubicS,0,'flip') ease2 (i+0.75,0.25,CubicS,100,'flip') ease2 (i+1,0.5,CubicS,0,'flip')
ease2 (i+1.5,0.5,CubicS,100,'invert') ease2 (i+2,0.5,CubicS,0,'invert')
ease2 (i,1,BackS,-250,'tinyz') ease2 (i+1,1,BackS,0,'tinyz')
ease2 (i+2,0.5,CubicS,0,'x') ease2 (i+1,0.5,CubicS,100*f,'x') ease2 (i+1.5,0.5,CubicS,-100*f,'x')
ease2 (i+1,1,QuartS,20*f,'rotationz') ease2 (i+2,1,QuartS,0,'rotationz')
mod_kick(i,1,100, 300,'zoomx','Expo','Back')
ease2 (i,1,ExpoS,0.5,'bgzoom') ease2 (i+1,1,ExpoS,0,'bgzoom')
ease2 (i,1,ExpoS,-20*f,'bgrotz') ease2 (i+1,1,ExpoS,0,'bgrotz')
f = f * -1 end
ease {102, 1.5, QuartS, 100, 'reverse'} ease {104, 1.5, QuartS, 0, 'reverse'} ease {106, 1.5, QuartS, 100, 'reverse'} ease {110, 1.5, QuartS, 0, 'reverse'} ease {112, 1.5, QuartS, 100, 'reverse'} ease {118, 1.5, QuartS, 0, 'reverse'} ease {120, 1.5, QuartS, 100, 'reverse'} ease {122, 1.5, QuartS, 0, 'reverse'}
ease2 (114,1,CircS,0.5,'bgzoom') ease2 (116,1,CircS,-0.5,'bgzoom')
ease2 (108,1,CubicS,-1500,'z') ease2 (109,1,CubicS,0,'z') ease2 (108,1,CubicS,-5000,'tinyz') ease2 (109,1,CubicS,0,'tinyz')
ease2 (124,1,ExpoS,-1000,'z') ease2 (125,1,SineS,0,'z') ease2 (124,1,ExpoS,300,'zoom') ease2 (125,1,SineS,100,'zoom') ease2 (124,1,ExpoS,-5000,'tinyz') ease2 (125,1,SineS,0,'tinyz')
ease {124, 1, flip(linear), 1000, 'shakez'}
mod_bounce(124,2,0, 50,'brake','Cubic','Sine')
mod_bounce(108,1,100, 150,'zoomx','Cubic','Cubic') mod_bounce(109,1,100, 150,'zoomy','Cubic','Cubic')
ease2 (114,1,CubicS,150,'tipsy') ease2 (115,1,CubicS,-150,'tipsy') ease2 (116,1,CubicS,0,'tipsy')
ease2 (114,1,CubicS,50,'skewx') ease2 (115,1,CubicS,-50,'skewx') ease2 (116,1,CubicS,0,'skewx')
ease2 (114,1,CubicS,-50,'noteskewx') ease2 (115,1,CubicS,50,'noteskewx') ease2 (116,1,CubicS,0,'noteskewx')
ease2 (125,0.5,CubicS,100,'invert') ease2 (125.5,0.5,CubicS,0,'invert')
mod_bounce(126,1,0, 150,'tipsy','Cubic','Cubic') mod_bounce(127,1,0, -150,'tipsy','Cubic','Cubic') mod_bounce(128,1,0, 50,'skewx','Cubic','Cubic') mod_bounce(129,1,0, -50,'skewx','Cubic','Cubic')
ease2 (126,0.5,SineS,200,'drunk') ease2 (126.5,0.5,SineS,-200,'drunk') ease2 (127,0.5,SineS,200,'drunk') ease2 (127.5,0.5,SineS,-200,'drunk') ease2 (128,0.5,CubicS,0,'drunk')
ease2 (130,1,CircS,-50,'rotationx') ease2 (131,1,CircS,50,'rotationx') ease2 (132,1,CircS, 0,'rotationx') ease2 (130,1,CircS,-300,'movez') ease2 (132,1,CircS, 0,'movez')
ease2 (131,1,CircS,-300,'mini') ease2 (132,1,CircS, 0,'mini')
mod_bounce(130,2,0, 100,'brake','Cubic','Cubic')
mod_bounce(130,2,0, -1000,'tinyz','Cubic','Cubic')
------------------- buildup 2 --------------------------------------
ease {196, 218-196, QuartS, 30, 'rotationx'}
ease {196, 218-196, QuartS, 50, 'brake'} ease {196, 218-196, QuartS, 100, 'wave'} ease {196, 218-196, QuartS, 0.5, 'bgzoom'}
ease2 (220,1,ExpoS,0,'wave') ease2 (220,1,ExpoS,0,'brake') ease2 (220,1,ExpoS,0,'bgzoom') ease2 (220,1,ExpoS,0,'rotationx')
local f = 1 for i=196,210,2 do add2 (i,1,CubicS,180*f,'blacksphere') add2 (i+1,1,CubicS,180*f,'blacksphere') ease2 (i,2,ExpoS,20*f,'rotationz') f = f * -1 end
local f = 1 for i=196,210,4 do ease2 (i,1,ExpoS,75*f,'x',1) ease2 (i+1,1,ExpoS,140*f,'x',1) ease2 (i+2,1,ExpoS,75*f,'x',1) ease2 (i+3,1,ExpoS,0,'x',1)
ease2 (i,1,ExpoS,-75*f,'x',2) ease2 (i+1,1,ExpoS,-140*f,'x',2) ease2 (i+2,1,ExpoS,-75*f,'x',2) ease2 (i+3,1,ExpoS,0,'x',2) f = f * -1 end
local f = 1 for i=196,211 do mod_kick(i,1,0, 100,'y','Cubic','Cubic') mod_kick(i,1,0, 0.1,'bgkick','Cubic','Cubic') --mod_kick(i,1,0, 100,'brake','Cubic','Cubic') f = f * -1 end
ease2 (212,1,ExpoS,0,'rotationz')
ease2 (198,1,ExpoS,100,'scanlinepos') ease2 (200,1,ExpoS,0,'scanlinepos') ease2 (202,1,ExpoS,100,'scanlinepos')
ease2 (206,1,ExpoS,0,'scanlinepos') ease2 (208,1,ExpoS,100,'scanlinepos') ease2 (210,1,ExpoS,0,'scanlinepos') --------------------- wibble wubble ---------------------------------------- ease2 (295.5,0.75,inverse,500,'movex3') ease2 (295.75,0.75,inverse,500,'movex2') ease2 (296,0.75,inverse,500,'movex1')
ease2 (297.5,0.75,inverse,-500,'movex3') ease2 (297.75,0.75,inverse,-500,'movex1') ease2 (298,0.75,inverse,-500,'movex2')
ease2 (303.5,0.75,inverse,500,'movex2') ease2 (303.75,0.75,inverse,500,'movex0') ease2 (304,0.75,inverse,500,'movex1')
ease2 (305.5,0.75,inverse,-500,'movex0') ease2 (305.75,0.75,inverse,-500,'movex1') ease2 (306,0.75,inverse,-500,'movex2')
ease2 (311.5,0.75,inverse,500,'movex0') ease2 (311.75,0.75,inverse,500,'movex1') ease2 (312,0.75,inverse,500,'movex2')
ease2 (313.5,0.75,inverse,-500,'movex0') ease2 (313.75,0.75,inverse,-500,'movex2') ease2 (314,0.75,inverse,-500,'movex1')
ease2 (292,1,CubicS,100,'reverse',2)
ease2 (292,1,CubicS,300,'zoomz')
ease2 (294,1,ExpoS,100,'scanlinepos') ease2 (295,1,ExpoS,0,'scanlinepos') ease2 (296,1,ExpoS,100,'scanlinepos') ease2 (297,1,ExpoS,0,'scanlinepos') ease2 (298,1,ExpoS,100,'scanlinepos') ease2 (299,1,ExpoS,0,'scanlinepos')
ease2 (302,1,ExpoS,100,'scanlinepos') ease2 (303,1,ExpoS,0,'scanlinepos') ease2 (304,1,ExpoS,100,'scanlinepos') ease2 (305,1,ExpoS,0,'scanlinepos')
ease2 (310,1,ExpoS,100,'scanlinepos') ease2 (311,1,ExpoS,0,'scanlinepos') ease2 (312,1,ExpoS,100,'scanlinepos') ease2 (313,1,ExpoS,0,'scanlinepos') ease2 (314,1,ExpoS,100,'scanlinepos') ease2 (315,1,ExpoS,0,'scanlinepos')
local f = 1 for i=294,294+5 do mod_kick(i,1,0, 300,'z','Cubic','Cubic') mod_kick(i,1,0, 0.3,'bgkick','Cubic','Cubic') mod_bounce(i,1,0, 50,'brake','Cubic','Cubic') mod_kick(i,1,0, -1000,'tinyz','Cubic','Cubic') add2 (i,1,ExpoS,180,'bgrotx') f = f * -1 end
local f = 1 for i=294,294+5,2 do mod_bounce(i,2,0, 30*f,'rotationz','Quart','Quart') mod_bounce(i,1,0, 50*f,'rotationx','Quart','Sine') mod_bounce(i+1,1,0, 50*f,'rotationx','Quart','Sine') f = f * -1 end
local f = 1 for i=302,302+3 do mod_kick(i,1,0, 300,'z','Cubic','Cubic') mod_kick(i,1,0, 0.3,'bgkick','Cubic','Cubic') mod_bounce(i,1,0, 50,'brake','Cubic','Cubic') mod_kick(i,1,0, -1000,'tinyz','Cubic','Cubic') add2 (i,1,ExpoS,180,'bgrotx') f = f * -1 end
local f = 1 for i=302,302+3,2 do mod_bounce(i,2,0, 30*f,'rotationz','Quart','Quart') mod_bounce(i,1,0, 50*f,'rotationx','Quart','Sine') mod_bounce(i+1,1,0, -50*f,'rotationx','Quart','Sine') f = f * -1 end
local f = 1 for i=310,310+5 do mod_kick(i,1,0, 300,'z','Cubic','Cubic') mod_kick(i,1,0, 0.3,'bgkick','Cubic','Cubic') mod_bounce(i,1,0, 50,'brake','Cubic','Cubic') mod_kick(i,1,0, -1000,'tinyz','Cubic','Cubic') add2 (i,1,ExpoS,180,'bgrotx') f = f * -1 end
local f = 1 for i=310,310+5,2 do mod_bounce(i,2,0, -30*f,'rotationz','Quart','Quart') mod_bounce(i,1,0, -50*f,'rotationx','Quart','Sine') mod_bounce(i+1,1,0, -50*f,'rotationx','Quart','Sine') f = f * -1 end
end)
